verses.verse: That which<WG3739> was<WG2258> from<WG575> the beginning<WG746>, that which<WG3739> we have heard<WG191>, that which<WG3739> we have seen with<WG3708> our<WG2257> eyes<WG3788>, that which<WG3739> we beheld<WG2300>, and<WG2532> our<WG2257> hands<WG5495> handled<WG5584>, concerning<WG4012> the Word<WG3056> of life<WG2222>

(and <WG2532> the life<WG2222> was manifested<WG5319>, and<WG2532> we have seen<WG3708>, and<WG2532> bear witness<WG3140>, and<WG2532> declare<WG518> unto you<WG5213> the life<WG2222>, the eternal<WG166> life<WG2222>, which<WG3748> was<WG2258> with<WG4314> the Father<WG3962>, and<WG2532> was manifested<WG5319> unto us<WG2254>);

that which<WG3739> we have seen<WG3708> and<WG2532> heard<WG191> declare we<WG518> unto you<WG5213> also<WG2532>, that<WG2443> ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> may have<WG2192> fellowship<WG2842> with<WG3326> us<WG2257>: yea<WG2532>, and our<WG2251> fellowship<WG2842> is with<WG3326> the Father<WG3962>, and<WG2532> with<WG3326> his<WG846> Son<WG5207> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>:
and <WG2532> these things<WG5023> we<WG1125> write<WG5213>, that<WG2443> our<WG5216> joy<WG5479> may be<WG5600> made full<WG4137>.

And <WG2532> this<WG3778> is<WG2076> the message<WG31> which<WG3739> we have heard<WG191> from<WG575> him<WG846> and<WG2532> announce<WG312> unto you<WG5213>, that<WG3754> God<WG2316> is<WG2076> light<WG5457>, and<WG2532> in<WG1722> him<WG846> is<WG2076> no<WG3756> darkness<WG4653> at all<WG3762>.

If <WG1437> we say<WG2036> that<WG3754> we have<WG2192> fellowship<WG2842> with<WG3326> him<WG846> and<WG2532> walk<WG4043> in<WG1722> the darkness<WG4655>, we lie<WG5574>, and<WG2532> do<WG4160> not<WG3756> the truth<WG225>:

but <WG1161> if<WG1437> we walk<WG4043> in<WG1722> the light<WG5457>, as<WG5613> he<WG846> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> the light<WG5457>, we have<WG2192> fellowship<WG2842> one<WG240> with<WG3326> another<WG240>, and<WG2532> the blood<WG129> of Jesus2424, 5547 his<WG846> Son<WG5207> cleanseth<WG2511> us<WG2248> from<WG575> all<WG3956> sin<WG266>.
If <WG1437> we say<WG2036> that<WG3754> we have<WG2192> no<WG3756> sin<WG266>, we deceive<WG4105> ourselves<WG1438>, and<WG2532> the truth<WG225> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> in<WG1722> us<WG2254>.

If <WG1437> we confess<WG3670> our<WG2257> sins<WG266>, he is<WG2076> faithful<WG4103> and<WG2532> righteous<WG1342> to<WG2443> forgive<WG863> us<WG2254> our sins<WG266>, and<WG2532> to cleanse<WG2511> us<WG2248> from<WG575> all<WG3956> unrighteousness<WG93>.

If <WG1437> we say<WG2036> that<WG3754> we have<WG264> not<WG3756> sinned<WG264>, we make<WG4160> him<WG846> a liar<WG5583>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> word<WG3056> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> in<WG1722> us<WG2254>.
